comments.body: how do i build it on linux/macs?
R/install-dev.sh -- Its in README.md. Or you can just use '-PsparkR' in maven
It was a rhetorical question, Shiv :) I think you'd want to say something about other platforms, if you are talking about windows. Otherwise it can be pretty confusing.
I will rename this to `WINDOWS.md` :) Basically I had to do a bunch of things to get it to build on windows and I decided to document it.
